question:
Which of the following forts were conquered by Mahmud Begarha?
1) Junagarh  
2) Champaner
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: Mahmud Begarha was the most prominent Sultan of the Gujarat Sultanate. He launched upon a career of conquests. He defeated the chiefs of Kutch and also conquered the forts of Junagarh and Champaner. He suppressed the pirates of Dwarka.
